snippet: Traders were also worrying that last week’s strong jobs report opened the way for the first rate hike from the Federal Reserve in nearly a decade.
abstract: Stocks fall sharply over concerns that global economy is slowing.
lead_paragraph: Traders were also worrying that last week’s strong jobs report opened the way for the first rate hike from the Federal Reserve in nearly a decade.

headline.main: Market Slides on Concerns of Cooling Global Economy
